pageContext.display_address: 864 Santa Rosa St, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401
pageContext.geocode_address: 864 Santa Rosa St, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Bring Minecraft to life using LEGO® parts! Build a motorized walking Creeper, a terrifying Ghast, and a motorized Minecart! This project-based camp, designed by Play-Well instructors, combines the basic format of our core engineering-themed programs based on the world of Minecraft. Students will explore real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture while building their favorite Minecraft objects. Students will have a blast, even without any prior experience with Minecraft or the LEGO® building system.
pageContext.course_type_name: Minecraft Master Engineering with LEGO® Materials
pageContext.action_url_comment: The City of SLO will open summer camp registration on May 6th.  To find our camps click the registration link and search for "LEGO".
